x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: In today’s fast-paced digital world, individuals struggle to manage their time, finances, and health effectively. There’s no unified platform that tracks daily movement, spending habits, investment behavior, health metrics, and app usage—all in one place. This lack of visibility leads to poor decision-making, unhealthy routines, and financial inefficiencies.

x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Service Portal – for user registration, dashboard, and monthly reports
  • Record Producer – to collect user preferences and manual logs
  • Flow Designer – to automate data aggregation, report generation, and notifications
  • Virtual Agent – for lifestyle tips, goal setting, and progress tracking
  • Notification Engine – to send reminders, alerts, and insights
  • Performance Analytics – to visualize trends in health, spending, and time usage
  • IntegrationHub – for connecting with GPS, financial apps, fitness trackers, and image recognition APIs
  • Survey Management – for collecting feedback and refining recommendations
  • Now Mobile (optional) – for real-time tracking and mobile access

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Integration with GPS and vehicle tracking APIs
  • Integration with financial platforms and investment apps
  • Integration with fitness trackers and health apps
  • AI-based image recognition for food calorie estimation
  • App usage tracking via mobile OS APIs
  • Secure data handling and privacy controls

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring user privacy and secure data management
  • Integrating diverse data sources (location, finance, health, app usage)
  • Building accurate AI models for calorie estimation
  • Encouraging consistent user engagement and data input
  • Managing scalability and performance across large datasets
  • Providing actionable insights without overwhelming the user
